text: Last year, Amy Poehler and Nick Offerman teamed up to host a craft competition show for NBC. Ahead of its premiere later this month, the network released a promo this week featuring Poehler and Offerman competing against each other in a craft - themed pun - off : “ I macraméd you and I can macrabreak you just as easily. ” Titled Making It ( previously titled The Handmade Project ), the six - episode series will follow “ eight all - around makers, from all walks of life ” as they compete in a series of craft projects with the hopes of impressing Poehler, Offerman, and expert judges.
